title: Virgile Bruni
text: Virgile Bruni (Born 6 February 1989) is a French <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player. His usual position is as a Flanker, and he currently plays for <a href="Lyon%20OU">Lyon OU</a> in the <a href="Top%2014">Top 14</a>. In January 2014, Bruni was called into the <a href="France%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">French</a> squad for the <a href="2014%20Six%20Nations%20Championship">2014 Six Nations Championship</a>.
